headline: J.P. Morgan Raises PT on Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) Keeps an Overweight Rating
summary: ​Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE:TMO) is one of the Best Forever Stocks to Invest In Now. On October 9, J.P. Morgan analyst Casey Woodring raised the firm’s price target on Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE:TMO) from $600 to $650, while keeping an Overweight rating on the stock. ​The rating comes ahead of the company’s fiscal […]

headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific to Accelerate Life Science Breakthroughs with OpenAI
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., October 16, 2025--Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO), the world leader in serving science, announced plans to further increase the impact of Thermo Fisher’s proven growth strategy through the use of artificial intelligence (AI) with OpenAI. This collaboration will help to improve the speed and success of drug development, enabling customers to get medicines to patients faster and more cost effectively.

raw.headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific to Accelerate Life Science Breakthroughs with OpenAI

headline: Residual DNA Testing Research Report 2025-2035: Adoption of NGS and Real-Time PCR Technologies and Growing Demand for Personalized Medicine Bolster Market Growth
summary: Residual DNA Testing is vital in detecting trace DNA post-biological processes, crucial for safety across biotechnology, pharmaceuticals, and forensics. It ensures biopharmaceuticals like vaccines are contaminant-free, as required by FDA and EMA. Growing demand in biopharma, powered by the rise of gene therapies and personalized medicine, drives market expansion. Key players like Thermo Fisher and Roche innovate with technologies like NGS. headline: Healthcare CMO Analysis Report 2025: Market to Reach $291.25 Billion by 2029, Driven by Catalent, Samsung Biologics, and Thermo Fisher Scientific
summary: The global healthcare CMO market, valued at $145.83 billion in 2023, is expected to surge to $291.25 billion by 2029, driven by increased demand for pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical products due to rising chronic diseases and an aging population. Pharmaceutical outsourcing to CMOs helps companies cut costs and leverage advanced manufacturing technologies. Key trends include AI adoption, personalized medicine, and sustainable practices.
